mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN A.password = '${password}' THEN 'SUCCESS' else 'FAIL' END FROM account A WHERE A.email = '${email}'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO account (email, nickname, password, company, joinDate, emailConfirm, jobConfirm) VALUE ('${email}', '${nickname}','${password}', '${company}', NOW(), 0, 0)
